mapper.update: update orderlist set opaymentkey=#{opaymentkey} where oid=#{oid}
update orderlist set ostatus=#{ostatus} where oid=#{oid}
update member set mhpoint=#{mhpoint},mtotal=#{mtotal} where mid=#{mid}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL ( count, 0 ) as count, b.hours as hours FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count , to_number(TO_CHAR ( a.odeptdate, 'HH24' )) AS hours FROM orderlist a WHERE a.odeptdate BETWEEN to_date(#{odeptdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND to_date(#{odeptdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') + 0.99999 AND a.odept=#{odept} AND a.ostatus in ('on_delivery', 'deliver_complete', 'fail_delivery') GROUP BY TO_CHAR ( a.odeptdate, 'HH24' ) ) a right join ( SELECT to_number(TO_CHAR ( LEVEL ))-1 as hours FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 24 ) b on a.hours = b.hours order by 2

select member.mname, member.memail, o.odept, o.oid, o.odeptdate from (select * from orderlist where odeptdate <= CURRENT_DATE + 2/24 AND odeptdate >= CURRENT_DATE and not ostatus = 'pay_cancel' ) o join member on member.mid = o.mid
